title: 9p Two blocks or 18p one block for sale at Rajagiriya
details:
18p prime plot of land for sale at Cooray Mawatha, Rajagiriya

Facing 20 ft wide road
Suitable for commercial or residential purpose
It is most suitable for Apartment complex
High residential area
Anyone can bought it as 9p separate blocks or 18p one block
Asking Rs. 2.2mn pp
